quote: It's good for me to see so many other people who are not me. That there are so many others. I feel affection for them. Most of them are doing the best they can. I am also doing the best I can.
quote_letters: ITS GOOD FOR ME TO SEE SO MANY OTHER PEOPLE WHO ARE NOT ME THAT THERE ARE SO MANY OTHERS I FEEL AFFECTION FOR THEM MOST OF THEM ARE DOING THE BEST THEY CAN I AM ALSO DOING THE BEST I CAN
